docs.snippet: James Harden had another triple-double, though this one wasn't record-setting like his last. Still, it was enough to help the Houston Rockets to their fifth straight win....
docs.lead_paragraph: James Harden had another triple-double, though this one wasn't record-setting like his last. Still, it was enough to help the Houston Rockets to their fifth straight win.

headline.main: Gordon, Harden Lead Rockets to 101-91 Win Over Wizards

docs.snippet: Former Hong Kong leader Donald Tsang, the highest-ranking ex-official to be charged in the city's history, on Tuesday denied bribery related to the decoration of a luxury penthouse in the neighbouring Chinese city of Shenzhen....
docs.lead_paragraph: Former Hong Kong leader Donald Tsang, the highest-ranking ex-official to be charged in the city's history, on Tuesday denied bribery related to the decoration of a luxury penthouse in the neighbouring Chinese city of Shenzhen.

headline.main: Hong Kong's 'Bow Tie Tsang' Denies Graft Related to China Penthouse
headline.print_headline: Hong Kong's 'Bow Tie Tsang' Denies Graft Related to China Penthouse

docs.snippet: In stories on Nov. 24, 2014; Dec. 1, 2014; and Jan. 2, 2017, about former Bishop Thomas Dupre, The Associated Press reported erroneously that he was defrocked by the Vatican in 2006. The Diocese of Springfield says Dupre was not defrocked....
docs.lead_paragraph: In stories on Nov. 24, 2014; Dec. 1, 2014; and Jan. 2, 2017, about former Bishop Thomas Dupre, The Associated Press reported erroneously that he was defrocked by the Vatican in 2006. The Diocese of Springfield says Dupre was not defrocked.

docs.snippet: China's yuan is likely to see more volatility against the U.S. dollar this year after its foreign exchange market operator changed the way it calculates a key yuan index by nearly doubling the number of foreign currencies in its basket....

headline.main: China's Yuan May See More Volatility vs. Dollar After Basket Change
